title.rendered: Meadow Bistro Dining Set – various options

content.rendered:
The Meadow Outdoor Bistro Dining Set comprises: two of our stackable Meadow chairs plus our Meadow Bistro Dining Table with a Topalit Laminate top for great integrity. 

The Meadow Chair is stackable 3 high and is made with an aluminium frame and a rattan effect polypropylene seat and backrest. 

The Meadow Table Base is made from painted aluminium, suitable for indoor and outdoor use. 

Ideal for commercial use, such as coffee shops, hotels and care homes. Easy to clean and care for – suitable for all weather, indoor and out!

1 year warranty.

Dimensions in mm:

– Meadow Armchair: 420D x 460W x 880H x 450 Seat Height

– Meadow Side Chair: 400D x 430W x 890H x 460 Seat Height 

– Meadow Dining Base: 730H

– Topalit Top: overall 34mm thick with 26mm thick core

This item requires basic self assembly.
